title: Ep 257 | Jase 'Pillages' a Fan's Yard, How to Worship Like a Prostitute & Equality vs. Favoritism
description:
Jase goes metal detecting with his buddies and ends up in the yard of an "Unashamed" listener who hands him a big check. Phil, Jase, and Al break down what happens when a culture faces impending doom, social justice, the difference between favoritism and equality, and the definition of God equality. And Jase is on board with an edgy T-shirt idea — "Worship Like a Prostitute" — as long as one edit is made.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
